message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. We believe it could significantly enhance your business operations. Considering its value and benefits, I am offering it to you for $12000. This is a special introductory price, and we're confident it will provide excellent returns on your investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your perspective on the market value. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $10500. This reflects a middle ground between our initial offer and your counteroffer, while still accounting for the unique value and quality of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your valuation of our product. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $10000. This price reflects a compromise between our initial offers, taking into account both the market value and the unique benefits the product provides.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $9750 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial price. Based on our previous discussions, I am willing to consider $9875 as the final price for the product. This price takes into account the value it will bring to your business and the quality of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product, which is the highest price I'm willing to go. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $9625. This price reflects a compromise based on the value of the product and the benefits it will bring to your business.
I'm willing to meet you at $9500, Alice. This is the absolute highest price I'm willing to pay. I hope we can come to an agreement.
